schema.title: Marketplace

items.description: A struct describing a token module, provided with the instantiation message this struct is used to record the info about the module and how/if it should be instantiated

identifier.description: Can be either an address or identifier of an ADO in a app.

schema.description: The Marketplace is an ADO that allows you to sell your NFTs in a marketplace.

ui:options.title: Modules
ui:options.description: An optional vector of Andromeda Modules. "rates", "address_list", "receipt" modules can be added.

alerts.text: Each sale is assigned an Id which starts at 1 and increments for each new sale.

ui:options.title: Identifier
ui:options.description: Can be either an address or app component name of a specific ADO within an app

ui:options.title: Module Type
ui:options.description: The name of the module to add. Can be set one of the following: "rates", "address_list", "receipt".

ui:options.title: Is Module Able to be Modified?
ui:options.description: Whether the module can be later modified or not.
